nodes.text: The Thieves' Quarter, formerly known as the Quarter of the Beatific, was an area of Kijimi City on the planet Kijimi. It was once home to the Lorrdian religious group known as the Brotherhood of the Beatific Countenance, but the group were chased off by the rise of criminality in the city. By the time of the war between the First Order and the Resistance, the Thieves' Quarter was a refuge for criminals and those who wished to remain hidden, including the Spice Runners of Kijimi.
